page.title: 20 LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: Our area lies within Cambridgeshire and is represented on the County Council by our own Independent Councillor, Mrs.Jean Willmer. At a more local level Mr.Hugh Duberly represents us on the Huntingdon District Council. The Parish became divided when Perry, with its lakeside Housing Estate, formed its own Parish in 1982. The Parish Councils are responsible for overseeing the care and repair of footpaths, lighting, fences etc. { ----------------} { ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS { ----------------} Thanks are due to the children of Class Six, whose combined writing appears on these pages, and to the sixty families whose Survey replies were used for statistical analyses. {G.&H.Westcott:Gt.Staughton School,1985
